column4: Hi, I had to hotplug my cdrom drive, and it won't mount - error msg is Special device /dev/scd0 does not exist
how can I mount my hot plugged cdrom drive without rebooting?
the power connector was off, I plugged it back in, the IDE cable was always on
if the bios did not recognized it at boot, no chance
no, that is just the cp player modus, the ide is not recognized so all it can do is play music now.
